title: Looking for mentor. Im level 16 and like to play adc.
body: I want someone to teach me the game while playing as my support

replies.body:
https://www.reddit.com/r/summonerschool/new/ Is a great subreddit dedicated to helping new players. 
https://www.reddit.com/r/summonerschool/wiki/index#wiki_new_to_league.3F
